title: Add "Remote Audio Capture" option
author: lineardraft
body_snippet:
Hi,
Is it possible to request a  "Remote Audio Capture" under "Redirect" options in the "Config" section, as already existing in Windows default "Remote Desktop Connection" client (see pic below). Thank you.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/25457572/22467208/fe95bb4e-e7c3-11e6-8738-43adc68f4ed1.png)

Best regards
Vladimir
